title: Holcim US' 2023 Sustainability Achievements Accelerate Decarbonization - PR Newswire
summary: Holcim US invests heavily into reaching sustainability goals across its entire supply chain by transitioning to renewable energy sources, developing carbon capture technology, and promoting the circular economy. The company's initiatives include increasing the production and sale of sustainable products, investing in renewable energy sources such as solar arrays and battery energy storage systems, and replacing fossil fuels with alternative fuels. Holcim US is committed to decarbonizing its operations and products to provide sustainable building solutions and infrastructure.
product_or_process: Use of low-carbon cements and concretes, renewable energy, carbon capture research

title: Kentucky's Unbridled Solar Project Marks a Renewable Energy Milestone - Microgrid Media
summary: The Unbridled Solar project, set to be operational in 2024, marks a significant shift in Kentucky's energy landscape, transitioning from its coal-centric past to a more sustainable and diverse energy future. This project, along with other upcoming initiatives, underscores the state's evolving approach toward cleaner energy sources. The development of solar energy projects provides economic opportunities through job creation and new revenue streams while aligning with global efforts to reduce carbon emissions and combat climate change.
green_innovation: TRUE, the Unbridled Solar project is a green innovation because it contributes to environmental sustainability goals by reducing reliance on fossil fuels and promoting renewable energy.
business_innovation: TRUE, the Unbridled Solar project is a business innovation because it is a new and improved product (solar array) that differs significantly from the firm's previous products or business processes and has been introduced on the market.
green_product: TRUE, the Unbridled Solar project can be considered a green product because it is a good (solar array) that is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific green process.

greenwashing: FALSE, the Unbridled Solar project does not appear to be an example of greenwashing as it is a genuine green innovation and business innovation with clear environmental benefits.

title: SolaX Power & LUBI Electronics Signed Strategic Partnership Agreement for India Market - SolarQuarter
summary: SolaX, a global supplier of solar inverters and energy storage solutions, has partnered with LUBI Electronics, a prominent name in the Indian electronics industry, to distribute SolaX products across India. This partnership will make SolaX's advanced solar technology more accessible to consumers in India. SolaX is known for delivering high-performance, reliable, and cost-effective solar solutions, while LUBI Electronics has a strong presence and reputation in the Indian market.
product_or_process: solar inverters and energy storage solutions

title: VIETNAM BUSINESS NEWS DECEMBER 28/2023 - VietNamNet
summary: Vietnam is investing in infrastructure projects, including 13 new ones next year, to improve connectivity and reduce travel times. The country is also seeing a rise in new business registrations, with a record 159,294 enterprises entering the market in 2023. The pharmaceutical retail industry is experiencing a competitive race for market share, with major players expanding their chains and new foreign players entering the market.
